definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: dig, search for (Ar. h.afara id.; Aram. [[חֲפַר]], h.par, id.; NH [[חֵפֶר]] act of digging)—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: a well, c. acc. [[בְּאֵר]] Ge 21:30 (E), Ge 26:15, Ge 26:18, Ge 26:18, Ge 26:19, Ge 26:21, Ge 26:22, Ge 26:32 (J), Nu 21:18 (E); cf. Ex 7:24 (E); dig (a hole, implied as obj.) De 23:14; a pit, with hostile purpose, as snare or trap, fig. of malicious plan, c. acc. [[בּוֹר]] Ps 7:16 (‖[[כָּרָה]]); so c. acc. [[גומץ]] Ec 10:8, cf. [[[שַׁחַת]]][[לְנַפְשִׁי ]] ´[[ח]] Ps 35:7; of horse, dig, i.e. paw the ground, [[יַחְפּׂר בָּעֵמֶק]] Job 39:21 (so rd., v. supr.) he paweth in the valley (cf. Ar. h.a0firun hoof).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: dig for something hidden, c. acc. Job 3:21 (fig. of longing for death), Je 13:7 (no obj. expr.)

search, search out, explore, c. acc. [[הָאָרֶץ]] Jos 2:3, Jos 2:3 (JE), De 1:22; of eagle, search for food, c. acc. [[אׂכֶל]] ´[[ח]] Job 39:29, with esp. reference to keen vision (‖[[מֵרָחוֹק עֵינׇיו יַבִּיטוּ]]); so = search or look carefully about before going to rest Job 11:18 (no obj.).—[[לַחְפּׂר]] Is 2:20 v. [[חֲפַרְפָּרָה]] infr.
